name: Good night
album_name: Your City Is A Desert To Me
lyric:
Good Night

Good Night, My Wounded Lover, Good Bye
Good Night, Child In Abyss, Good Bye
Tonight Is The Last Night, Our Hearts Unite
We'Ll Meet Again, In The Realms Of Bliss, In The Realms Of Light
　　
Good Night, My Cruel Brother, Good Bye
Good Night, Child In Chaos, Good Bye
Tonight Is Just The Night, Our Souls Are Untied
We'Ll Freely Glide, Through The Darkness, To The Unknown Side
　　　　
Good Night, My Wounded Lover, Good Bye
Good Night, My Cruel Brother, Good Bye
Tonight Will Be The Night, So Calm & Bright
We'Ll Meet Again, In The Realms Of Bliss, In The Realms Of Delight
　　
Don't Ever Wake Up, I Won't Wake You Up
lyric_extra: 文本歌词最后由 Day 编辑于2019-09-11 15:17

comments.brief:
虾米要散了，很不舍。
